expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to 'tier' mode based on the keyword in arguments
Agent displays the Tier Selection table with three tiers: Team+waves, Subagent wave, Single session
Agent explains the criteria for each tier: 3+ domain-crossing streams for teams, 2+ independent actions for subagent waves, single action or shared file dependencies for single session
Agent includes model guidance: opus as default, sonnet only for routine/mechanical tasks, haiku only for trivial zero-risk tasks
Agent emphasizes the mandatory rule: always select the highest tier whose criteria are met, never reduce tier to save cost
